Text: Further boosting the top line is that the company also continues to strategically open new shops to fuel future growth. The company opened 86 net new stores in the U.S. and added another 38 internationally.
Cause: Further boosting the top line is that the company also continues to strategically open new shops to fuel future growth.
Effect: The company opened 86 net new stores in the U.S. and added another 38 internationally.
Sentence: <e1>Further boosting the top line is that the company also continues to strategically open new shops to fuel future growth.</e1> <e2>The company opened 86 net new stores in the U.S. and added another 38 internationally.</e2>
